import re

def replace_email_url(s):
    email_pattern = ''
    url_pattern = '(http://www\\.|https://www\\.|http://|https://)?[a-z0-9]+([\\-\\.]{1}[a-z0-9]+)*\\.[a-z]{2,5}(:[0-9]{1,5})?(/.*)?'
    s = re.sub(email_pattern, 'EMAIL', s)
    s = re.sub(url_pattern, 'URL', s)
    return s

import re

def replace_email_url(s):
    email_pattern = '\\b[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Z|a-z]{2,}\\b'
    url_pattern = ''
    s = re.sub(email_pattern, 'EMAIL', s)
    s = re.sub(url_pattern, 'URL', s)
    return s

import re

def replace_email_url(s):
    email_pattern = '\\b[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Z|a-z]{2,}\\b'
    url_pattern = '(http://www\\.|https://www\\.|http://|https://)?[a-z0-9]+([\\-\\.]{1}[a-z0-9]+)*\\.[a-z]{2,5}(:[0-9]{1,5})?(/.*)?'
    s = re.sub(email_pattern, '', s)
    s = re.sub(url_pattern, 'URL', s)
    return s

import re

def replace_email_url(s):
    email_pattern = '\\b[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Z|a-z]{2,}\\b'
    url_pattern = '(http://www\\.|https://www\\.|http://|https://)?[a-z0-9]+([\\-\\.]{1}[a-z0-9]+)*\\.[a-z]{2,5}(:[0-9]{1,5})?(/.*)?'
    s = re.sub(email_pattern, 'EMAIL', s)
    s = re.sub(url_pattern, '', s)
    return s
